title: Bugsplat during Game Please Help!!
body:
My game crashed during the middle of a game (right now)! It's saying it'll take 30 minutes to re-patch the corrupted files. Am I going to get a LeaverBuster for this?? It's about 3Gb of files.

{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
Oh that sucks, sorry to hear it's happening to you.  :(  This can happen if your game files become corrupt or driver issues are failing to render the game.  Definitely let the repair tool do its work, then test it in a custom game.  Should the issue persist, run through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help resolve this.

You won't get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for just one game, but you could if there's a history.
Thanks for your help. It's happened a handful of times in the past. I assumed there was nothing I could do about it.
